summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3701 for the improvement of Hanford Street, from 35th Avenue South to 36th Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 45518, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
